page.topic: Moving Selected Records to another Table

section.description: When you are viewing a form or browse, you can move the currently selected set of records.

step.description: Pick the target table from the Target table list.
Optionally, click the 'binocular' icon to view the Xbasic code generated by this procedure.
Click OK to move the currently selected records to the target table and delete them from the current table or click Cancel to exit without any action.
